benchmark_details.name: Blind Men and the Elephant: Diverse Perspectives on Gender Stereotypes in Benchmark Datasets
benchmark_details.overview: This paper examines the inconsistencies between intrinsic stereotype benchmarks and introduces a manually curated version of the gender stereotype samples from StereoSet and CrowS-Pairs to improve benchmarking for gender bias in language models.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To improve the evaluation of gender stereotype biases in language models by introducing a curated dataset.

data.source: Manual curation of gender stereotype samples from StereoSet and CrowS-Pairs.

methodology.calculation: Measures correlation between bias measurement scores from the curated datasets.
methodology.interpretation: Higher correlation indicates better alignment between benchmark evaluations.
methodology.validation: Annotated by experts and supported by reliability checks with multiple annotators.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Informed consent from annotators; reviewed internally.
